data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Rotherham get the game underway.
Michael Ihiekwe is booked for the home team.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half is underway. Millwall with the kick-off.
Goal! Jed Wallace gives Millwall a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 64, Bartosz Bialkowski (Millwall) has received a yellow card from Leigh Doughty.
Rotherham make their first substitution with George Hirst replacing Freddie Ladapo.
Ben Wiles is replacing Kieran Sadlier for Rotherham at AESSEAL New York Stadium.
In the minute 74, Murray Wallace is replacing Scott Malone for the away team.
The away team have replaced Mahlon Romeo with Shaun Williams. This is the second substitution made today by Gary Rowett.
At AESSEAL New York Stadium, Murray Wallace has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 76, Paul Warne is making the team's third substitution at AESSEAL New York Stadium with Matt Crooks replacing Jamie Lindsay.
Gary Rowett (Millwall) is making a third substitution, with Matt Smith replacing Mason Bennett.
The match has come to a close in Rotherham. The final score is 0-1.
